verses.text: “\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w someone|strong="H5315"\w* \w sins|strong="H2398"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* failing \w to|strong="H8085"\w* testify \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w hears|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w public|strong="H6963"\w* charge \w about|strong="H8085"\w* something \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w witnessed|strong="H7200"\w*, \w whether|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w learned|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w Or|strong="H4480"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w someone|strong="H5315"\w* \w swears|strong="H7650"\w* thoughtlessly \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w to|strong="H7650"\w* \w do|strong="H3190"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w* \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w evil|strong="H7489"\w*—\w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* matter \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w may|strong="H5315"\w* \w rashly|strong="H8193"\w* pronounce \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*—\w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w unaware|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w realizes|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* guilty \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* matter.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* someone incurs guilt \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* these ways, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* must \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w committed|strong="H2398"\w*,

then \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* some \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w side|strong="H7023"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w while|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rest|strong="H7604"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w drained|strong="H4680"\w* \w out|strong="H4680"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w base|strong="H3247"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*. \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* must \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w bird|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H4941"\w*. \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w way|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w will|strong="H2398"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H6213"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H2398"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w afford|strong="H3027"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w turtledoves|strong="H8449"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* ephah \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \f + \fr 5:11 \ft A tenth of an ephah is approximately 2 dry quarts or 2.2 liters (probably about 2.6 pounds or 1.2 kilograms of flour).\f* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w olive|strong="H8081"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H1961"\w* \w way|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H3722"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* these \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w committed|strong="H2398"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* remainder \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w belong|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* grain \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*.” Laws for Guilt Offerings (Leviticus 6:1–7; Leviticus 7:1–10)
\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w someone|strong="H5315"\w* \w acts|strong="H4603"\w* \w unfaithfully|strong="H4604"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sins|strong="H2398"\w* \w unintentionally|strong="H7684"\w* \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H5315"\w* \w bring|strong="H2398"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* guilt \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: \w an|strong="H4480"\w* \w unblemished|strong="H8549"\w* ram \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* proper \w value|strong="H6187"\w* \f + \fr 5:15 \ft Or flock or its equivalence\f* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* \w according|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*;\f + \fr 5:15 \ft A shekel is approximately 0.4 ounces or 11.4 grams of silver.\f* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* guilt \w offering|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Regarding|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w thing|strong="H6944"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H3548"\w* harmed, \w he|strong="H5414"\w* must \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w adding|strong="H3254"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* value \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w behalf|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ram \w as|strong="H3254"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* guilt \w offering|strong="H4480"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3254"\w* \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w someone|strong="H5315"\w* \w sins|strong="H2398"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* violates \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w unaware|strong="H3045"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w guilty|strong="H5771"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w bring|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* \w unblemished|strong="H8549"\w* ram \w of|strong="H4480"\w* proper \w value|strong="H6187"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w as|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* guilt \w offering|strong="H4480"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H3722"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w behalf|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wrong \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H3045"\w* \w committed|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w*.

\w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* guilt \w offering|strong="H3068"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* certainly guilty \f + \fr 5:19 \ft Or he has paid full compensation\f* before \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”
